values:
Jesus Christ. Rukia you want me to have a heart attack, don't you? <s>Stop leaving my apartment in the middle of the night without telling me.</s>

<lj-cut text="Private to Hiyori">I got a couple of extra tickets to that football game. Why don't you take them and take someone special.

Nice day today, kinda different that the weather is so good. If I've learned something, never trust good weather. Or bad weather either. Don't trust weather in general.

<lj-cut text="private to Inoue">Inoue,
How ya holding up?</lj-cut>

<lj-cut text="private to Rukia">Quit calling what happened Friday night cheesy. This is what I get for going out on a limb and trying to be all romantic-like. </lj-cut>

Tuesday, July 22nd, 2008

Freaking idiots keep yammering their mouths need to shut their traps. It's bad enough that people come up to me still and congratulate me for coming out of the closet. For the last time, I'm not gay and that old Yamamoto guy is not going to croak any time soon. Get it out of your freaking heads and STOP ASKING ME ABOUT IT. Rukia- Tomorrow is Friday. Ishida- Tomorrow is Friday.

If you feel the need to, I guess it's okay to give me a birthday gift. Even if it's something expensive I don't mind it. <s>iPod...</s>

Oh and Ishida, I'm warning you that you better not give me something lame like an apron or an oven mitt or something equally as crappy. And those ingredients I saw you try to hide better be for a chocolate cake. Inoue, you're coming over too, right?

<lj-cut text="Private to Rukia">Oi, so you don't have anything planned tonight, yeah? Come over, we'll have cake and beer. Maybe pizza.</lj-cut>

Tuesday, July 15th, 2008

No rumor, no snarky comment, no insults...nothing can get me down today.

Monday, July 14th, 2008
First off, I am too hungover to deal with this crap AND not that it's anyone's business but nothing happened. If that's all, I'm going home for the rest of the day. Thursday, July 10th, 2008

Ugh.

I'm never drinking again.

<lj-cut text="Private to Hiyori but a hung over Ichigo messed it up so it's really public">I think we should talk about last night.</lj-cut>

<font size="1">[[feel free to note that he's wearing the same outfit from the day before >D]]</font>

Thursday, July 10th, 2008

Hell yeah, it's Friday. 

Ishida, we're going out to a bar of my choice this time. I ain't gonna get caught dead in that place you took us to last time. <s>Weird ass music and even weirder people...</s> And don't go ordering up some girly drink there. Sitting next to a guy who drinks cosmopolitans does nothing for my image. Really. Do you know how to fix up iPods?

Yuzu, do you need me to bring over anything for dinner Sunday night?

<font size="1">[[ooc: since Ichigo doesn't live there, I still want him to have dinner with his family on Sunday nights~]]</font>

Friday, July 4th, 2008

I was going to take the high road and not complain about the weather but....DAMN IT IS SO UNGODLY HOT DOWN IN THIS STUPID FREAKING MAIL ROOM.

If anyone needs me, I'll be somewhere <s>shady</s> <s>and sleeping...</s>

Thursday, July 3rd, 2008

I found my Moving Pictures tape. <s>Found it wedged underneath the fridge...</s>

Ishida, you got a whole week of Rush to look forward to!
What the hell, is it monsoon season or something? Despite the fact that the wet look does good for the ladies, I ain't too thrilled about waterlogged shoes.
Today is the day. No more chickening out, Kurosaki. Be a man.

I...had a fun time. <s>Even if someone is still pouting over it.</s> Next time you curl up to me don't blame it on the cold. I know you want my body.

<lj-cut text="Private to Ishida">I won, pay up. Ha, no money to buy your 12 sided dice this month. But you'll live.</lj-cut>

<lj-cut text="Private//Easily hackable because Ichi sucks at computers">Shiiiiit. I chickened out in telling her. I don't know what my goddamned problem is but I gotta do something or...or I might lose her to someone. I'm thinking about taking her out to a nice place on Friday and springing it on her. If she don't feel the same way, I guess...it ain't a big deal or nuthing.   I mean I finally did something 'sides pine away at her. Fuuuuuuck, what if she laughs at me or something. Damnit, I'm so fucking scared when it comes to her.</lj-cut>

Fucking cold! I spent half my morning scraping ice off my windshield, then it took most of the drive to heat the damn car to a normal temperature. And I swear to god there's a terrible draft in my room or something. Picked up my guitar, it's been a long time but I'm churning out some good tunes. Rukia- We haven't been out for awhile. Want to see a movie or something...And no sappy, stupid chick flick. It's bad enough Yuzu made me believe Beaches was The Beach. Ishida - You owe me five dollars. I told you I wouldn't forget.

[expletive deleted] storm last night. And you know what? I forgot to roll up my windows. That's right now my car smells like moldy ass. [expletive deleted] luck I'm having. I was cleaning out some papers and I came across an old picture of us, it musta been when Karin and Yuzu were babies. Don't know what the hell it's doing here. Dad, you ran out of room on your office walls or something? Well don't hang them up here. It's bad enough you tried hanging up embarrassing pictures of me in the bath...Thank god it's against company policy. Wednesday, August 15th, 2007

That little...too-good-to-answer-her-e-mails...brat! Yeah yeah, you heard me! Better be at that party or I'm going to drag you to it myself. I ain't gonna be real gentle about it either.

Friday, August 10th, 2007

People have been weird around me lately. I don't understand it and then I found this: over my name plate when I came back from lunch. Someone trying to recommend a movie? Edit: Just found out this is all because of some rumor that I'm a serial killer. Riiiiight. Stupid ass people need to find something better to occupy their time with. July 19th, 2007

It was rainy. I...hate the rain. The grass was overgrown, I thought people were supposed to take care of this shit. I had to spend fifteen minutes before the girls got there to fix it up. Dad's still going on about grandkids. He even went into details about 'how much our son has grown up' and 'you should be so proud, he's become a man among men.' I don't see how he can be so cheerful, he should be blaming me for her death. And work. I'll be out of work more than I've been there this week. At least they didn't take it out of my vacation time. I hope Keigo didn't screw up the mail too bad while I was gone. I still think he's the one forwarding Rukia those stupid letters...fucking not-so-secret admirers. July 18th, 2007

Shit.

I was sick all day Saturday <s>had to be that damn midget stealing the blanket</s>.

Of course I thought I'd be well enough to get in some hours this week but the stupid ass weather.

I ain't coming into work today, I got a nice cup of instant soup with my name on it and a TV guide.

First time I've been sick in three years, what the hell is up with that?

Thursday July 12th, 2007
